options.name: Penchant for Dramatics
options.description: Gain +1 Performance. You can use your Performance Modifier in situations where a Persuasion Check would be called for to persuade, deceive or intimidate.

options.name: Reaction : Feign Death
options.description: In response to a Creature making an Attack against you, make a Performance Check to pretend that you have died. Any Creature with a Persistent Insight Check higher than your Performance Checks can tell that you are feigning, otherwise you are believed to be dead.

options.name: Reaction : Mocking Taunt
options.description: In response to a Creature starting their turn within 4 Units of you, make a Performance Check against their Insight. If it fails, the Creature has a 1d4 Penalty to Attack Checks against any Target other than you. This does not work on Beasts, Constructs or Creatures without the ability to make Insight Checks.

options.name: Reaction : Improvise
options.description: In response to failing a Defense Check, make another Defensive Check using a different Skill with a 1d4 Bonus.

options.name: Free Action : Encore!
options.description: After rolling a True Hit on a Creature with an Attack, make a different type of Attack on the same Creature such as a Spell after using a Melee Attack or an Attack with a Ranged Weapon after hitting with a Melee Weapon. If the Target dies as a result of this Attack, you gain a Heroic Action.
